link_desc:
Simple python script allows to create value maps from SNMP MIB files. It can list parsed values from SNMP MIB file values to cli or create value maps in Zabbix server via API.

Any feedback would be really appreciated...

Example of listing:

>>zbx-value-mapper.py list -m E:\cisco-ucs -v CucsVnicConfigIssues

0 => pinningVlanMismatch

1 => vnicVlanAssignmentError

2 => missingPrimaryVlan

3 => pinnedTargetMisconfig

4 => unresolvedVlanName

5 => inaccessibleVlan
author: dubidrubi
